post_title: FS/FT ONE LEFT! - PSA 3.5 Crease Free Portrait - Bill Hallman
post_content:
So I got a little carried away with my Bill Hallman super-collection.  

Bill Hallman (KC) - 14 years in the Majors - Hallman owns one significant Major League recorded as the only player in history to improve his batting average in nine consecutive seasons,[5] beginning at .206 in 1888 and ending at .320 in 1896.

Add $5 shipping and ships same business day before 2PM CST.

PayPal, Venmo or Zelle - No-Fee - Accepted
